name: Hotel Torino

reviews.text: We booked a room at Hotel Torino quite by chance, without knowing much about Italian riviera. We found the hotel located in a small touristy place, close to the beach. The hotel outside did not look promising, however inside the hotel everything was new, refurbished, clean and tidy. Hotel is some 100 metres from the beach, in pedestrian area (difficult to get to by car), offers a garage in the same street (8 EUR/day). Reception was efficient (although I think we were welcomed by the owner, other reception staff was a bit difficult to communicate in English). Rooms were totally ok, not too spacious, but clean. Comfortable beds, nice bathroom, electric shutters, in-room safe, small TV, fridge. For my taste, breakfast was poor, mostly sweets which I am not very fond of. However, dinner was superb, free buffet and choice of first and second choices (you make your choice every morning for the evening), plus desert. Restoraunt staff was excellent. Hotel provides you sunbeds and umbrellas at the nearest beach - which is nice and saves you app. 13 EUR a day for two. All in all, we did not know what to expect and we returned very pleased with our stay.
reviews.title: Satisfactory

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On a recent visit to the Italian riviera, I had the opportunity to spend a couple of nights - once again - at the Hotel Torino in Diano Marina. When I arrived, with surprise, I noticed that the hotel has just gone through a full renovation.
reviews.title: Completely renewed
This is one to take a pass on!
reviews.text: Rooms are bigger now, halls are much more stylish and especially, now it has a new roof terrace overlooking the sea which is simply great in clear mornings.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Highly recommended if you pass by.
reviews.title: The best we could hope for

description: Hotel Torino is right in Diano Marina town centre near the pedestrian shopping area. It is 150 metres from its own private beach, to which you will enjoy free access. You can start your day with a free breakfast at Hotel Torino's panoramic rooftop restaurant. Bikes are provided free at Hotel Torino and the hotel has its own pool with jacuzzi. There is also a gym on site and you can sunbathe on the terrace.
